plot: The Good Omen in Bahrain culture and traditions is hanging one of the most famous women dress which called "Al-Nashal" over the house roof as an announcement about the joy of the return for one of the family from travel, or a long absence.
title: Al-Bashara
plot_es: The Good Omen in Bahrain culture and traditions is hanging one of the most famous women dress which called "Al-Nashal" over the house roof as an announcement about the joy of the return for one of the family from travel, or a long absence.
